This page covers biological details of component Putamen.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Forebrain Telencephalon -> Basal Ganglia (BGA.FT.BG) -> Striatum (BGA.FT.ST) -> Putamen (BGA.FT.PU) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaBGA Basal Ganglia Area]
  * *Role*: relay
  * *Function*: Stimulus-response, or habit, learning
  * *Notes to function*: Regulate movements and influence various types of learning; inhibitory nucleus
